Springboro Ordinances

Codified Ordinances of Springboro, Ohio

Download this project as a .zip file Download this project as a tar.gz file

CHAPTER 440 Commercial and Heavy Vehicles

440.01Load limits.

440.02Maximum width, height and length.

440.03Wheel protectors.

440.04Vehicles transporting explosives.

440.05Towing requirements.

440.06Loads dropping or leaking; tracking mud; removal required.

440.07Vehicles with spikes, lugs and chains.

440.08Occupying travel trailer while in motion.

440.09Route and load information.

440.10Shifting load; loose loads.

440.11Truck traffic on East Street.

440.12Alley weight restriction.

CROSS REFERENCES

See section histories for similar State law

Display of certificates of registration - see Ohio R.C. 4549.18

Arrest notice of drivers - see Ohio R.C. 5577.14

Stopping at grade crossings - see TRAF.432.33

Slow-moving equipment at grade crossings - see TRAF.432.33

Fatigued or ill drivers - see TRAF. 442.02

Truck loading zones - see TRAF. 452.09

Bus stops and taxicab stands - see TRAF. 452.10
